title: Naomi's Home Companion: A Treasury of Favorite Recipes, Food for Thought and Country Wit and Wisdom
description: A charming collection of recipes and motivational messages drawn from the author personal experiences includes simple dishes from when she was a single mother such as Shell Macaroni, Mexican Cornbread, Tuna Salad, the first meal she prepared for her future husband, and family meals of today. 250,000 first printing.
author: Naomi Judd
